general_education.ge_overlap: 9 units satisfied by major coursework: UD Areas 2or5, 3, 4

american_institutions.overlap: may be satisfied in GE Areas 3B, 4, UD 3, UD 4

upper_division.course_name: Writing in the Humanities & Interdisciplinary Arts
Digital Media: Platforms, People, and the Planet

notes: String: Students must select one course from each SJSU Studies Area: Area 2 or 5 (Earth, Environment, and Sustainability), Area 4 (Self, Society & Equality in the U.S.), and Area 3 (Cultures and Global Understanding).
String: The Area of Specialization consists of 18 units designed in consultation with the Associate Dean of Undergraduate Education and academic advisor to reflect individual learning goals.
String: University Electives may include credit for prior learning as per EO 1036.
